basics.name: Deshay Clemons
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021.

education.institution: Leeward Community College, Pearl City, HI

highlights: Organizing store products neatly and ensuring they are in the correct isles
Re-stock shelves, help customers find what they need, and work the cashier register

work.position: Peer Mentor/Facilitator II for Natural Science
highlights: Provided general assistance, clerical, and administrative support to counseling faculty and staff in the support of Leeward students, specifically first-year students
Created and participated in programs and activities that support students retention, persistence, and success both inside and outside of the classroom

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
